item.title: The slaying of a white springbok will cause the other springbok to disappear
item.summary: The people of |han≠kass'o's country do not kill a white springbok, because they believe that the other springbok will disappear.
item.comments: 1) p.7993v: |han≠kass'o heard this from his maternal grandfather (Tsatsi); see Notes on rock painting copy no. 5, no. 6. and no. 7 , 2) This story is found in Book VIII-22
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
